data.eml:eml: Lost and found: The Eocene family Pyramimitridae (Neogastropoda) discovered in the Recent fauna of the Indo-Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kantor, Yuri, Lozouet, Pierre, Puillandre, Nicolas, Bouchet, Philippe (2014): Lost and found: The Eocene family Pyramimitridae (Neogastropoda) discovered in the Recent fauna of the Indo-Pacific. Zootaxa 3754 (3): 239-276, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.3.2
